data.name: Ultra Mega Cats
data.detailed_description:
Ultra Mega Cats is a high-paced roguelike cooperative TPP shooter. As a player, you control one of the cat-mech hybrids escaping their corporate prison

CORE FEATURES
- Special characters with different playstyles and personalities
- Roguelike progression with unique character skillsets (a multitude of possible builds)
- Streamlined, arena-based co-op PvE combat for up to 4 players
- Hand-crafted combat areas arranged into ever-changing biomes through level generation




Freedom of Movement
As you move throughout the world, you can feel that this is done with cat-like agility. The combat arena is meant to be your ultimate playground, which you can explore in every dimension.

Wildly Customizable Playstyle
Each character in UMC is unique and plays differently. Choose your favorite cat, personalize your loadout and discover thousands of build possibilities, tailored to your liking.

Constant High Octane Action
UMC provides player with extremely intense runs, with little downtime. Combined with vibrant, cartoon artstyle it is geared towards players seeking constant thrill.

data.short_description: Ultra Mega Cats is a high-paced roguelike cooperative TPP shooter. As a player, you control one of the cat-mech hybrids escaping their corporate prison

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
